exclusion.criterion: Able to provide informed consent and agree to the risks of the study
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Will be taken to the OR to have the stricture surgically fixed
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pelvic organ prolapse past the hymen
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Multiple sclerosis, myasthenia gravis, Parkinson's Disease, stroke within the past 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Positive pregnancy test at the time of consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Positive urine dip (>+1nitrites or >1+LE) and urinary symptoms at the time of consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Taking anticholinergic medications for urinary incontinence
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: >2 replies of ≥ "sometimes" on the Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms questionnaire at the time of consent
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a severe bulbar urethral stricture and will require surgical intervention. He is able to provide informed consent.
